titles.title: To amend the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act to clarify certain rules of origin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act to provide that rum manufactured in a beneficiary country which meets certain requirements and which is used in the production or processing of articles in Canada shall be treated as originating in a U.S. territory for purposes of the United States-Canada Free-Trade Agreement.
